data.title: Walt Disney Movies Index
data.meta_description: Walt Disney movies by letter and by year
data.text:
The table below lists the top-grossing Walt Disney movie released in each calendar year (based on worldwide box office). Click on the year number for a list of all the Walt Disney films released that year. The "Annual Stats" links will take you to a summary of the domestic film business for Walt Disney movies for the year in question (this part of our archive starts in 1995). Click on the movie name to see information on the individual film.

YearAnnual

StatsTotal

MoviesAverage

Production

BudgetCombined

Worldwide

The table below shows the highest-grossing Walt Disney movie that begins with each letter of the alphabet. Click on the name of the film to go to its page. Or click on the letter at the beginning of each row for a list of all the Walt Disney movies beginning with that letter.
